newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Changchai '96 net 238 mln yuan.
newsitem.headline: Changchai '96 net 238 mln yuan.

text.p: Diesel engine maker Changchai Co Ltd had net profits of 238.09 million yuan for 1996, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange said in a notice after the market closed on Tuesday.
Earnings per share were 0.676 yuan and turnover reached 2.76 billion yuan in 1996, the exchange said.
It did not say whether the figures were based on Chinese or international accounting standards or give comparative figures.
In 1995, the company posted net profits of 203.13 million yuan on turnover of 2.16 billion under international standards.
The company proposed a cash dividend of 0.36 yuan per A share based on profits made in the January-August period of 1996, while proposed no dividend for B shares, the exchange said.
Trading in the company's A and B shares will be suspended on Wednesday morning and resume in the afternoon, it said.
